did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Libraries. Special Collections Research Center.

did.abstract: Collected memorabilia from Gilbert and Sullivan operettas.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: George Mason University. Libraries. Special Collections Research Center.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Gilbert and Sullivan Collection must be obtained from Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Gilbert and Sullivan collection, C0290, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processing completed by Elizabeth Beckman in June 2016. EAD markup completed by Elizabeth Beckman in June 2016.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: SNAC project biographical information for and

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Postcards, collectible cards, a cloth, and pages from magazine that all feature scenes and characters from Gilbert and Sullivan plays.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Matierial is generally grouped by medium in one folder.
